knowledge_panel.description: delphine software international was a french video game developer. they were famous for publishing another world and creating the cinematic platform game flashback, which bore a similarity to prince of persia, both in gameplay and in its use of rotoscoped animation. they were also known for their moto racer series. wikipedia

related_keywords: is flashback a sequel to another world
